hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdur-Rahman bin Al-Qasim:I heard my father who was the best man of his age, saying, "I heard `Aisha saying, 'I perfumed Allah's Apostle with my own hands before finishing his Ihram while yet he has not performed Tawaf-al- Ifada.' She spread her hands (while saying so)

chapter.ara-name: باب الطِّيبِ بَعْدَ رَمْىِ الْجِمَارِ وَالْحَلْقِ قَبْلَ الإِفَاضَةِ
chapter.eng-name: To perfume after Rami and to have head shaved before Tawaf-al-Ifada
